author: CBS News
title: California governor to announce plans to ease virus restrictions
description: Gavin Newsom says moves will be based on science, not politics, after Trump insists only he can decide when curbs will come off
content:
Sacramento, California — Gov. Gavin Newsom said he will reveal plans Tuesday for gradually releasing California from the coronavirus restrictions that have kept 40 million residents indoors for much of the last month.
Newsom didn't provide a specific date fo… [+4563 chars]
